idea:

idea:
Wellness Beverages Private Limited is launching a fortified Nutritional and flavored drink for all age groups. Offering a 250ml Nutritional flavored drink with unique packaging system in Indian Market. The drink will be offered with superior taste and absolutely low sugar, no preservatives. It aims at improving the health of the society by providing Nutritional drinks which claims that it will boost immunity.

The introduction of a Fortified Nutritional flavored drink into the industry will revolutionize the nutrition drink industry to a different level by to satisfying the growing consumer needs for healthy drink and at the same time providing tremendous health benefits. Potentially it will promote a healthy lifestyle as the flavors make people consume more water, along with nutrition.

We aim at providing health benefits by using a rich herbal treasure that our country poses through ages, which originate from our rich Vedas practiced in India through centuries.

Vision:

Reach to the masses and provide them with Nutritional Drink at affordable prices

Mission:

Transform the concept of “Cure to Care” and from “Being Well” to “Well Being”
name: WELLNESS BEVERAGES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
QuickSpace Technologies F1 Works Pvt Ltd - doing our bit to usher in a revolution with the Global Patented Building Construction Technology (Patent CN105370039A date 02/03/2016, Copyright No. L-76969/2018 , L-76970/2018 and copyright Dairy No. 1152/2019-CO/A) , S3C (Single Cast Concrete Construction) Modular Buildings . QuickSpace is a Pioneer in the construction-manufacturing space. Its new Innovated and Patented Building Construction Technology - S3C Modular Buildings is paving the way for a new revolution in the construction space in India. This technology promises to overcome site hassles, delays, and cost over-runs. S3C Modular Buildings - a concept where building construction activity is converted into manufacturing, performed inside a controlled factory environment.

Here, a building layout is broken down into multiple sized modules at design stage, then cast 3-dimensional inside a factory, finished inside-out, transported to site, to deliver a habitable building.


About the Technology:

1. Is an innovative state-of-art technology, which is destined to change the way INDIA constructs.

2. No perceived difference between Conventional Construction and S3C.

3. Caters to all types of building.

4. Facilitates faster construction, ensuring high quality, performance of the constructed buildings at affordable costs.


QuickSpace Technologies F1 works is one manufacturing unit for the purpose of producing, pre-finished building modules for a simplifying the assembly at site and completing the Building in 25% of time compared to today's Construction Technologies.
name: QUICKSPACE TECHNOLOGIES F1 WORKS PRIVATELIMITED

idea:
"Your ration of you and for you”
We want to reach everyone by providing them their right to healthy foods. Your Ration is formed with a goal to provide quality food to everyone. We are dealing in wheat flour, Rice, Sugar,Pulses, Mustard oil, and Spices. After ensuring the qualitative parameters we purchase the raw material directly from the farmers so that we can provide our customers with pure and natural products which in turn will be healthy for them. We don’t mix any chemical or any other things in our product to make the same attractive.
name: Youration
